body.content:
Atttn:Kowalski,

You are welcome Rudolf Gerhard Richter,

Acknowledgement, Yes the said fund originated from the Community of
West African States
(ECOWAS) .This fund supposes to be in your position long ago but you
did not follow the
normal process by obtaining (The TRANSFER ACCESS CODE)


In Regards of  your access transfer code that will enable you to
access the said funds that belong to you. It will cost you the sum of
1550EURO for you to obtain it,  the access transfer code will be issued
to you as soon as you make the payment of 1550EURO.

As soon as I hear from you regarding the payment I wlll direct you on
where and how to make the payment and after which your transfer access
code will be issue to you and you will have access to your funds with
out any delay.

For quick finalization of this transaction. be rest assured that
action and submission of the documents commence as soon as we receive
the above charge the sum of 1550EURO. for your Online access transfer code.

Thank you and God blessed.
Regards
Mrs. Jennifer Woods.

On 11/07/2021, kowalski@lkjhgfdsa.pl <kowalski@lkjhgfdsa.pl> wrote:
> Hello,
> how can I help you with this?
>
> Sincerely
> Kowalski
>
>

header.subject: Re: Hello, how can i help with this?
